articles.description: PFF's Nathan Jahnke breaks down Week 14 of the 2020 NFL season to determine how fantasy football's top skill players — and this week's waiver wire targets — might be used going forward.
articles.content: The fantasy playoffs have begun. The early slate of games gave us a mix of blowouts and failed fourth-quarter comeback attempts. Running back storylines ruled the day: Several RBs were missing due to… [+27957 chars]
